it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.PlayerController

  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls player actions, it contains the player's current state which is determined by the amount of damage received or the state of the game (regular turns or final frenzy round). The class contains the implementation of all basic possible actions (move, grab, shoot, reload, respawn) which are combined into different complex actions that a player can make during a turn

      • setState

        public void setState(java.lang.Integer index)
        Parameters:
        index - indicates one state in the stateControllerList 0 : normal state 1 : adrenaline 1 state 2 : adrenaline 2 state 3 : first frenetic state (taking frenzy turn before player 0) 4 : second frenetic state (taking frenzy turn after player 0)
